nodes.text: The Folna was a Agave-class picket ship in the New Republic Navy, commanded by Colonel Foag, and captained by Captain Madis.

During the Black Fleet Crisis, the Folna traveled to the ILC-905 system as part of a small task force led by the cruiser Indomitable—commanded by Commodore Brand—and including the gunship Vanguard. The task force discovered that the system was being used as a jump point for the Yevetha. Together, they engaged the Yevetha forces and won the eleven minute Battle of ILC-905.
